content.webTitle: If you liked the sound of that... try these

fields.headline: If you liked the sound of that... try these
fields.bodyText: Discover villages in the province of Granada, Spain, with Headwater Walking Holidays (01606 720 099) for £797pp departing 1 May from Gatwick, with seven nights in a converted farmhouse set in a white-washed village. Meals are included. Try an Italian 15-day hiking holiday in Cilento and Amalfi with Exodus (020 8675 5550). The price is £999 half-board departing on 9 May, and includes flights from Gatwick, transfers and some picnics. The Provençal Adventure is a six-night touring holiday that takes you through valleys, mountains, gorges and tunnels from Nice to Dignes les Bains. The cost is £499pp based on two sharing and includes Eurostar and TGV from Waterloo or Ashford to Nice. Departures any day between 1 April and 31 October with French Travel Service (01798 874 500). Breathtaking views and challenging walks are part of the Jungfrau and Eiger Trek through the Alpine Pass Route in Switzerland, with Exodus Walking and Treking (020 8675 5550). An eight-day walk brings you close to waterfalls cascading from rocky cliffs and to famous summits in the area. Departures are 1 and 8 August from Heathrow and cost £699 including most meals, accommodation and flights. Walk in the Floating Garden, the mountain and coastal scenery of Madeira with Headwater's Walking Holiday's (01606 720 099). Price for eight days is £1,157 staying in a five-star hotel with all meals. Departure is 5 or 12 May from Gatwick. Walking is quite gentle.
